about_the_game:
Note: The remainder of the OST, featured in Tape 2 "Rage", will become available as a free downloadable update when "Rage" is released on April 15, 2025.

The Lost Records: Bloom & Rage OST is an 18-track dream pop/ambient album led by explosive punk song "See You in Hell", and is by 3 female-led groups:

- Ruth Radelet, the former lead vocalist of Chromatics

- Milk & Bone, a Montréal electropop duo

- Nora Kelly Band, a fresh Montréal alt-country band.

This carefully crafted dreampop and ambient soundtrack is steeped in nostalgia and ethereal vibes, with tracks that'll linger like memories long after summer.
